Ink Cartridges.name: Ink Cartridges
Ink Cartridges.description: Ink cartridges are used for printing documents and images.

attributes.name: Printing colours
attributes.description: The available printing colours for the ink cartridges are photo black, yellow, magenta, light magenta, and cyan.

attributes.name: Quantity per pack
attributes.description: The ink cartridges are available in packs of 3, 1, 2, or 4.

attributes.name: BCP bubble graphic colour
attributes.description: The BCP bubble graphic colour options for the ink cartridges are magenta, black, or tri colour.

attributes.name: Brand compatibility
attributes.description: The ink cartridges are compatible with Epson, HP, Canon, and Brother brands.

attributes.name: Box contents
attributes.description: Each pack of ink cartridges contains ink cartridges.

attributes.name: Colour ink volume
attributes.description: The available colour ink volume options for the ink cartridges are 130 and 400.

attributes.name: OEM code
attributes.description: The OEM codes for the ink cartridges are C13T05964010, N9J72AE, C13T05974010, C13T03414010, and C13T00840110.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The ink cartridges are of the original type.

attributes.name: Colour
attributes.description: The ink cartridges are in colour.

attributes.name: Colour ink cartridges quantity
attributes.description: Each pack of ink cartridges contains 3 colour ink cartridges.

attributes.name: Conductor type
